name: Upside Down (itch) (jiaying330)
description:
* Based on https://github.com/abagames/crisp-game-lib

* Minimal JavaScript library for creating classic arcade-like mini-games running in the browser

* GitHub pages: https://github.com/Jiaying330/Upside_Down

Play the game via GitHub: https://jiaying330.github.io/Upside_Down/index.html?upside_down/
